tooltip.hawaiinei.morphite_ingot: Refined ingot pulses with latent energy
tooltip.hawaiinei.raw_morphite: This chunk of ore pulses with latent energy.
tooltip.hawaiinei.morphite_chisel: Tool that turns stone into brick on use
tooltip.hawaiinei.ulua_rod: Used to catch Large fish, Ulua and Tuna
tooltip.hawaiinei.boat_rod: Best for fishing from a boat
tooltip.hawaiinei.hot_stone: A blazing stone that radiates intense heat.
tooltip.hawaiinei.hot_sand: Superheated sand — surprisingly useful to heat other things.
tooltip.hawaiinei.ohia_log: Dense wood from the sacred ʻŌhiʻa tree.
tooltip.hawaiinei.ohia_planks: Refined ʻŌhiʻa wood, ready for construction or fire.
tooltip.hawaiinei.ohia_sapling: A young ʻŌhiʻa — burns quickly, but best planted.
tooltip.hawaiinei.hau_log: Light and fibrous wood, excellent for kindling.
tooltip.hawaiinei.hau_planks: Cut Hau wood with fast-burning properties.
tooltip.hawaiinei.hau_sapling: A fragile sapling of the Hau tree.
tooltip.hawaiinei.kukui_log: Heavy Kukui wood, dark and resinous.
tooltip.hawaiinei.kukui_planks: Cut Kukui lumber, slow and steady burn.
tooltip.hawaiinei.kukui_sapling: A sapling of the Kukui nut tree.
tooltip.hawaiinei.kukui_oil: Highly flammable Kukui oil, used in traditional lamps.
tooltip.hawaiinei.macadamia_sapling: Plant to grow a future fuel source.
tooltip.hawaiinei.mango_log: Fruity mango wood, aromatic when burned.
tooltip.hawaiinei.mango_sapling: A juicy future — or a short burn now.
tooltip.hawaiinei.milo_sapling: A Milo sapling, handle with care.
tooltip.hawaiinei.noni_log: Unusual wood from the healing noni tree.
tooltip.hawaiinei.papaya_planks: Slices of papaya wood, ready to light.
tooltip.hawaiinei.papaya_sapling: A papaya plant just getting started.
tooltip.hawaiinei.sandalwood_log: Fragrant and prized, sandalwood burns long.
tooltip.hawaiinei.sandalwood_planks: Aromatic sandalwood, perfect for ritual fires.
tooltip.hawaiinei.dried_ti_leaf: Dried ti leaves — lightweight and flammable.
tooltip.hawaiinei.morphite_magic_block.t: Strange Alchemical Device, known for altering §9Morphite§r
